summary: Adds a book to the arcanaeum in the collage of Winterhold that I\'ve written.
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve worked many hours on this book and finally it\'s finished . I don\'t know if there is anybody out there intrested in downloading and reading a book in Skyrim, but heck, I\'ll give it a try :)

I\'m really satisfied with the results and I do hope those who download it likes it.

I was slightly inspired by this mod and created a story about a king and his mask: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20077/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D20077

Happy reading. You can read the beginning of the book by checking out the 5 images containing book pages.
author: Conny Bengtsson
